description:
Bug-proof your cots, sleeping pads or mattress. This ultralight double-wide mesh shelter provides mosquito protection for two. The doorless design keeps things simple and lightweight, and the upper spreader bar ensures there's plenty of room to hang out inside.

  • 15-denier Ultra-Vis polyester woven into a tight 500 hole/sq. in. mesh provides protection from biting insects, without blocking breezes
  • 56cm spreader bar provides headroom when sitting upright
  • Single point suspension point and colour-coded corners for quick, easy set up
  • Tuck-in sides deal against a floor or mattress to keep out creepy crawlies
  • Floor dimenions: 2.4 x 1.7m
  • Stuff sack included
name: Sea To Summit Nano Mosquito Pyramid Net
